name: home for the break
description:
made with bitsy (and love!) for the bitsy jam #68. 

this is my first bitsy game! i love sleep and i love being comfy; those are two things i'm reminded of when i think of hibernation besides bears. i made this in one creative burst as it's about 5 in the morning when i initially posted this. 

it's been proofread for spelling errors. happy holidays!
